title: Bioexperiment
description: Schema for submitting metadata for an assay with 1 or more replicates.
comment: An experiment is a special case of dataset. It includes assay metadata, replicate information and data files.

date_submitted.title: Date submitted
date_submitted.description: The date that the experiment received all required replicates and files
date_submitted.comment: Do not submit. date_submitted will be assigned only by DCC personnel.

experiment_description.title: Experiment description
experiment_description.description: The functional description of the experiment.

biospecimen.title: Biosample information
biospecimen.description: The functional description of the experiment.

documents.description: Protocols or other documents that describe the assay or the results (not data files).

dbxrefs.title: External resources
dbxrefs.description: Identifiers from external resources that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.

items.title: External identifier
items.description: An identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.

internal_status.description: The status of an experiment in the DCC process.
internal_status.comment: unreviewed:wrangler has not evaluated, unrunnable:experiment requires more metadata to run, pipeline ready:experiment is ready for the pipeline, processing:pipeline is running, pipeline completed: pipeline has run through completion, requires lab review:there are QC concerns about this data, release ready:DCC feels that this is ready for release, pipeline error:pipeline run was started but failed for a reason that should be noted in pipeline_error_message
internal_status.title: Internal status

pipeline_error_detail.description: Explanation of why the experiment failed pipeline analysis.
pipeline_error_detail.comment: should be used on experiments with internal_status:pipeline error
pipeline_error_detail.title: Pipeline error message
